displaytitle: Black Canyon, Colorado River, Looking below from Big Horn Camp
creditline: Museum purchase, gift of William J. Salman, Class of 1955
inscribed:
Printed on mount, above image, center: WAR DEPARTMENT/CORPS OF ENGINEERS.  U.S. ARMY.
Printed on mount, above image, upper left corner: Explorations in Nevada and Arizona.
Printed on mount, above image, upper right corner: Expedition of 1871.-Lieut. Geo.M.Wheeler, Com’d’g.
Printed on mount, below image, lower left corner: T.H. O’Sullivan. Phot.
Printed on mount, below image, lower right corner: No 4.
Printed on mount, below image, center: BLACK CANON, COLORADO RIVER, LOOKING BELOW FROM BIG HORN CAMP.
Inscribed in pencil in unknown hand, recto along upper right side, sideways: 25
